description: Weight distribution of the dodecacode, a [[12,0,6]] quantum-error-correcting code.
comments: Also weight distribution of nonexistent extremal [12,6,6] code over GF(4) [cf. MacWilliams et al., 1978; Ward]. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 13 2010
references: F. J. MacWilliams, A. M. Odlyzko, N. J. A. Sloane and H. N. Ward, Self-Dual Codes Over GF(4), J. Combinatorial Theory, Series A, 25 (1978), pp. 288-318. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 13 2010
H. N. Ward, Combinatorial polarization, Discr. Math., 26 (1979), 185-197. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 13 2010
links: A. R. Calderbank, E. M. Rains, P. W. Shor and N. J. A. Sloane, Quantum error correction via codes over GF(4), IEEE Trans. Inform. Theory, 44 (1998), 1369-1387.
E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, Self-dual codes, pp. 177-294 of Handbook of Coding Theory, Elsevier, 1998 (Abstract, pdf, ps).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
